source.1981aef2:
for classfication_model in classification_models:
    
    model = eval(classfication_model)()
    
    model.fit(X_train,y_train)
    y_pred = model.predict(X_test)
    
    models.append(type(model).__name__)
    estimators.append((type(model).__name__,model))
    cm.append(confusion_matrix(y_test,y_pred))
    acc.append(accuracy_score(y_test,y_pred))
source.37e48791: In this notebook, we predict whether the health of a fetus is classified as normal, suspect, or pathological based on CTG data. We will practice Classification Algorithms to achieve the lowest prediction error.
